document_name: Support for the strengthening of the promotion and protection of Human Rights and Rule of Law through enhanced capacity of institutions in the Ministry of Justice and Legal Affairs
Support to Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Project Document

outputs.output_descr:
Capacity of the Zimbabwe Human Rights commission and Secretariat enhanced to effectively manage the process as is required of such a deliberative body including staffing vacant positions
Commissioners trained and oriented on key human rights concepts and substantive issues to enhance their understanding and abilities to effectively discharge their responsibilities
Informative and educative publications on Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission 
Strategic partnership forged with key stakeholders including CSO, Parliament, Government ministries and departments other commissions amongst other
A strategic plan developed

project_descr: Support for the strengthening of the promotion and protection of Human rights and Rule of Law through enhanced capacity of institutions in the Ministry of Justice and Legal Affairs
project_title: Support to the Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission
